content:
Create a Quick Action to Store the Generated Messaging Session Summaries

Create a quick action that stores the generated enhanced messaging session summaries in the fields of a Salesforce object. For example, the action stores messaging session summaries in Case object fields.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS:
Customize Application

To store the generated summaries in standard or custom fields of the MessagingSession object or one of its related objects. To store the summary in custom fields, first create the Summary, Issue, and Resolution fields with Text Area or Text Area (Long) field types.

In the Object Manager in Setup, open the Salesforce object that stores the generated summaries.
Click New Action.
Select Update a Record, and enter a label.
Save.
Select the three fields that store the generated summaries, and drag them to the layout.
If using custom fields, ensure they have a Text Area or Text Area (Long) data type. Fields with other data types can't store summaries.
Save.

Add the Wrap Up Component to the Messaging Session Record Page

Create Custom Fields
Enable Work Summaries for Enhanced Messaging Sessions 
Show Work Summaries for Voice, Email, and Live Chat
Track Service Metrics and Manage Your Team
Send Surveys with Feedback Management
title: Service Cloud Work Summaries Setup
